solution_line_template: First find the total time Missy spends watching reality shows: {num_reality_shows} shows * {minutes_per_reality_show} minutes/show = <<{num_reality_shows}*{minutes_per_reality_show}={total_reality_minutes}>>{total_reality_minutes} minutes

Then add that amount to the time she spends watching the cartoon: {total_reality_minutes} minutes + {cartoon_minutes} minutes = <<{total_reality_minutes}+{cartoon_minutes}={total_minutes}>>{total_minutes} minutes
